Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.rationale: To create the backend for an online bakery shop, it requires web development to build the necessary logic and infrastructure.
Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.purpose: Enables the creation of the back-end system for managing online transactions, inventory, and customer data.

Web Development -> Backend.rationale: Back-end is necessary to handle data, manage transactions, and provide the required functionality for an online bakery shop that sells cakes.
Web Development -> Backend.purpose: Enables managing inventory, processing orders, handling user authentication, and facilitating communication between the frontend and database.

Backend -> REST.rationale: REST is a popular and well-documented API standard that provides a simple and flexible way to communicate between the backend and frontend, which makes it suitable for building the backend for an online bakery shop.
Backend -> REST.purpose: Enables efficient communication and resource handling

REST -> JavaScript/TypeScript.rationale: JavaScript/TypeScript is widely used for web development and has a rich ecosystem for backend services with Node.js.
REST -> JavaScript/TypeScript.purpose: Enables the creation of a scalable, fast and flexible backend for an online bakery shop.

JavaScript/TypeScript -> Express.js.rationale: Widely adopted and well-documented, it provides a fast and simple way to build APIs for our online bakery shop.
JavaScript/TypeScript -> Express.js.purpose: Enables quick development of backend services

Express.js -> Caddy.rationale: It is a modern, easy-to-use web server with HTTPS support out of the box and automatic TLS.
Express.js -> Caddy.purpose: Enables serving the online bakery shop's website
